name: Foto Flash
description:
Foto Flash is an adventure game about two things: HOT BABES and FUNKY TRACKS. If you're into that then this is the game for you! Can you get enough photos in time to save the pin-up magazine? Explore the streets of Sala City and meet a cast of quirky characters in this fun adventure.Features
  • Become the world's greatest pin-up photographer.
  • Encounter unique and quirky characters.
  • Photograph 10 beautiful girls.
  • Assure your friends and family that you play it for the "story".
  • Unlockable Desktop Wallpapers.
  • Funky, upbeat soundtrack.
